text: Ashihhatan `Alaykum Fa'idha Ja'a Al-Khawfu Ra'aytahum Yanzuruna 'Ilayka Taduru 'A`yunuhum Kalladhi Yughsha `Alayhi Mina Al-Mawti Fa'idha Dhahaba Al-Khawfu Salaqukum Bi'alsinatin Hidadin 'Ashihhatan `Ala Al-Khayri 'Ula'ika Lam Yu'uminu Fa'ahbata Allahu 'A`malahum Wa Kana Dhalika `Ala Allahi Yasiraan
